blocks.name: dfateq12d
blocks.content: Equality deduction for "defined at". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfateq12d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wdfat(c0, c1), wdfat(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wdfat(c0, c1), wdfat(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c3)))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wfun(cres(c2, csn(c3))))
  eleq12d(c1, cdm(c0), c3, cdm(c2), w0)
  dmeqd(c0, c2, w0)
  funeqd(cres(c0, csn(c1)), cres(c2, csn(c3)), w0)
  reseq12d(c0, csn(c1), c2, csn(c3), w0)
  sneqd(c1, c3, w0)
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  df-dfat(c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfateq12d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[defAt]c1 ↔ c2[defAt]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = c3)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0[defAt]c1, c2[defAt]c3, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ Fun((c0 |` { c1 }))), (c3 ∈ dom(c2)∧ Fun((c2 |` { c3 }))))
  anbi12d(w0, c1 ∈ dom(c0), Fun((c0 |` { c1 })), c3 ∈ dom(c2), Fun((c2 |` { c3 })))
  eleq12d(c1, dom(c0), c3, dom(c2), w0)
  dmeqd(c0, c2, w0)
  funeqd((c0 |` { c1 }), (c2 |` { c3 }), w0)
  reseq12d(c0, { c1 }, c2, { c3 }, w0)
  sneqd(c1, c3, w0)
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  df-dfat(c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: nfdfat
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for "defined at". To prove a deduction version of this theorem is not easily possible because many deduction versions for bound-variable hypothesis builder for constructs the definition of "defined at" is based on are not available (e.g., for Fun/Rel, dom, C_, etc.). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfdfat(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnf(s0, wdfat(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1)))))
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  nfan(s0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  nfel(s0, c1, cdm(c0))
  nfdm(s0, c0)
  nffun(s0, cres(c0, csn(c1)))
  nfres(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  nfsn(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfdfat(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, c0[defAt]c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfxfr(s0, c0[defAt]c1, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ Fun((c0 |` { c1 }))))
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  nfan(s0, c1 ∈ dom(c0), Fun((c0 |` { c1 })))
  nfel(s0, c1, dom(c0))
  nfdm(s0, c0)
  nffun(s0, (c0 |` { c1 }))
  nfres(s0, c0, { c1 })
  nfsn(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dfdfat2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the predicate "defined at" not using the ` Fun ` predicate. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2017.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfdfat2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wdfat(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0))))))
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  anbi2i(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)))))
  mpbiran(wfun(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)))), wrel(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  relres(c0, csn(c1))
  dffun8(hs0, s0, cres(c0, csn(c1)))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)))), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  bitrd(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)))), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), wral(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralbidv(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(s0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0))), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  eubidv(s0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))
  a1i(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  elv(s0, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c0, csn(c1)), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  brres(cv(s0), universe, cv(hs0), c0, csn(c1))
  ralbinrald(hs0, cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))), c1, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  eldmressnsn(c1, c0)
  eldmressn(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eubidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  mpbirand(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  biimpri(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cres(c0, csn(c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(weu(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfdfat2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[defAt]c1 ↔(c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ ∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(c0[defAt]c1, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ ∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0)), (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ Fun((c0 |` { c1 }))), (c1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0))))
  df-dfat(c0, c1)
  anbi2i(c1 ∈ dom(c0), Fun((c0 |` { c1 })), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0)))
  mpbiran(Fun((c0 |` { c1 })), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0)), Rel((c0 |` { c1 })))
  relres(c0, { c1 })
  dffun8(hs0, s0, (c0 |` { c1 }))
  pm5.32i(c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0)), ∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  bitrd(c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0)), ∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom((c0 |` { c1 })), ∃!(s0,(hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0))))
  ralbidv(hs0, dom((c0 |` { c1 })), c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∃!(s0, hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0), ∃!(s0,(hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0)))
  eubidv(s0, c1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0, (hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0))
  a1i(c1 ∈ dom(c0), (hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0 ↔(hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0)))
  elv(s0, (hs0[(c0 |` { c1 })]s0 ↔(hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0)))
  brres(s0, universe, hs0, c0, { c1 })
  ralbinrald(hs0, dom((c0 |` { c1 })), c1, c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∃!(s0,(hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0)), ∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  eldmressnsn(c1, c0)
  eldmressn(hs0, c0, c1)
  eubidv(s0, hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0), c1[c0]s0)
  mpbirand(hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ { c1 } ∧ hs0[c0]s0), c1[c0]s0, hs0 ∈ { c1 })
  biimpri(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ { c1 })
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  anbi2d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ { c1 }, hs0[c0]s0, c1[c0]s0)
  breq1(hs0, c1, c0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 |` { c1 }))
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ dom(c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(dom((c0 |` { c1 })))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃!(s0, c1[c0]s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fundmdfat
blocks.content: A function is defined at any element of its domain. (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: dfatprc
blocks.content: A function is not defined at a proper class. (Contributed by AV, 1-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: dfatelrn
blocks.content: The value of a function ` F ` at a set ` A ` is in the range of the function ` F ` if ` F ` is defined at ` A ` . (Contributed by AV, 1-Sep-2022.)
